Directions: Prepare cake batter according to package directions.  Pour into a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.  In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar.  Stir in 1/4 cup chocolate chips.  Drop by tablespoonfuls over batter.  Cut through batter with a knife to swirl the cream cheese mixture.  Sprinkle with remaining chocolate chips.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool on a wire rack.  Cut into bars.
Ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix
